documentation.author: CERNER INNOVATION
documentation.purpose: A "Braden Score" result value of 18 or less will trigger the problem, "At risk for impaired skin integrity" if the problem does not already exist in an active status.
documentation.impact:
The following needs to be addressed at each client site:
E1 - EVENT SET NAME needs to be reinstantiated
L4 - DETAIL VALUE needs to be reinstantiated
L2, L9, L13, L15, L17, L20, L23, L26, L29, L32, L35, L38, L41, L44, L47, L50, L53, L56, L59, L62, L65, L68, L71, L74, L77, L80, L83, L86, L89, L92, L95 - EVENT SET NAME needs to be reinstantiated
L16 - OPT_ORDERS needs to be reinstantiated

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_EVAL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2

statements.statement: eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go /* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_INCOMING_REQ_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2

statements.statement:
eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go
/* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PROBLEMS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_PROBLEMS exist with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_COURSE for person LINK. Optionally narrow problem matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_END_TIME_L
templateDefinitions.definition: a STATUS result exists for EVENT_SET_NAME that is OPT_EVALUATION, OPT_VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 with an event end time within OPT_TIME_NUM, OPT_TIME_UNIT, OPT_DIRECTION, OPT_LINK's event end time.
templateDefinitions.description: Numeric result value, status, event end time

statements.statement:
eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go
/* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_COUNT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the number of orders selected in LINK is QUALIFIER NUM
templateDefinitions.description: Evaluates number of orders or clinical events found in preceding template

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_MESSAGE_L
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a message named MSGNAME with text of MSGTEXT preceded by OPT_DELIMITER
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a text message to be used by subsequent templates

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PROBLEMS_ADD_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Add PROBLEMS with OPT_QUALIFIER, CONFIRMATION, CLASSIFICATION, LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_COURSE, OPT_COMMENT for person LINK.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_ADD_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME to add ORDERS with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT for OPT_SCOPE as OPT_LINK
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare orderables to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PROBLEMS_UPDATE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Update details OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_COURSE, OPT_COMMENT for problem LINK.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_NOTIFY
templateDefinitions.definition: send subject SUBJECT with message MESSAGE to LOCATION linked to procedure PROCEDURE with priority PRIORITY under categories CLASS and SUBCLASS

column.value: Clinical Event End Date and Time
Clinical Event End Date and Time

statements.statement: select c.display_key ,c.cdf_meaning ,c.code_value from code_value c where c.code_set=220 and c.active_ind= 1 and c.begin_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and c.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and NOT c.cdf_meaning in ("ROOM","BED","FACILITY","BUILDING", "APPTROOT","BBDRAW","BBOWNERROOT","BBINVAREA", "COLLROOT","COLLRTE","COLLRUN","CSLOGIN","CSTRACK", "HIM","HIMROOT","INVGRP","INVLOC","INVLOCATOR","INVVIEW") and NOT c.cdf_meaning in ("MICRO STATIS","MMGRPROOT", "PTTRACK","PTTRACKROOT","PTRECYCLE","RXLOCGROUP","SRVAREA", "STORAGERACK","STORAGEROOT","STORAGESHELF","STORAGETRAY", "STORAGEUNIT","SURGFILL") order c.display_key

values.value: At risk for impaired skin integrity
At risk for impaired skin integrity

value.value: {\b @EVENTCDDISP:2 : @RESULT:2} as of @EVENTENDDTTM:2 \par\par The Braden Score value indicates a risk for skin breakdown. The problem, "At Risk for Impaired Skin Integrity" is active or has been added to the Problem List. If the "Pressure Ulcers Prevention and Management" plan is not in place, please add it to the patient's overall plan of care.

customValue.value: Intake < 50% of Normal in Last 3 Days

values.value: Intake < 50% of Normal in Last 3 Days

value.value: Your assessment indicates a risk for skin breakdown. The problem, "At Risk for Impaired Skin Integrity" is active or has been added to the Problem List. Evaluate the need for "Pressure Ulcers Prevention and Management" plan of care. \par\par @MESSAGE:[CRIT]

values.value: At risk for impaired skin integrity

value.value: Select orders from Pressure Ulcer Prevention Set.
Braden Score is equal to or less than 18.
Discern Alert - At Risk for Impaired Skin Integrity
